formattedAddress: 101 MacDougal St, New York, NY 10012, USA
adrFormatAddress: 101 MacDougal St, New York, NY 10012, USA

originalText.text: I rarely write reviews but I truly must say that throughout my short stay in the area that I adored patronizing this business. The owner is super friendly and my order (Mango Slush with pop mango with cheese foam) was absolutely delightful. I patronized the place multiple times within my short stay and without fail the owner will always help open up a straw for my drink  - itâ€™s the little acts of kindness that makes me feel good every time I visit this place for some boba, 10/10 recommended!

originalText.text: me and my friend were in the area trying to find a boba tea spot and our little walking journey led us to this place. as soon as we walked in we were welcomed by i am assuming the owner (male) , and his customer service was fantastic. he asked what brought us to his shop, made sure if we needed any help picking a drink, what surprised me the most is that when he gave us our drinks he put the straw in for us and made sure to taste it before we leave so he knew that we were happy with our drinks/what we ordered. very cute atmosphere and amazing customer service , will be back again to try the taro tea , as i tried the brown sugar one for the first time and it was so good !

originalText.text:
Me and my bro tried the grapefruit breeze and the mango milk with mango pudding. Both were super refreshing, good quality of flavor. Grapefruit tea is my control group for fruit teas when I try a new spot and this is one of the best Iâ€™ve had. (I am on the particular side when it comes to bubble tea/fruit tea too ðŸ˜…)

The owner was very welcoming, friendly patient with questions, and reassured me well that the grapefruit breeze was a solid choice when I had a second of doubt upon hearing my brother order the mango milk. I look forward to trying more of their teas!

originalText.text: First time ever going to this bubble tea place. One of the guy that works there have the best customer service I've ever met and that only that he recommend me the best bubble tea I've ever tasted. He was so polite. I recommend y'all to come here and get your bubble tea there. He deserves more than five stars. He deserves a 10 out of 10 for great customer service. And for the best bubble tea!

originalText.text:
I recently visited Mi Tea, and my experience was amazing!
The quality of the Strawberry and Mango Slashes exceeded my expectations. Both slashes were perfect, and had a rich and authentic flavor. I appreciated the attention to detail in every aspect of the drink preparation!
What truly stood out was the commitment to customer satisfaction. The staff was very patient and the service was prompt and efficient. The cozy ambiance of the store made it a great place to relax and enjoy my drink.
Overall, my visit to Mi Tea was a delightful experience, and I'll definitely be returning. If you're a bubble tea enthusiast or looking to try something new, I highly recommend giving this place a visit!
